transactionIdentification.description: Provides details about unique transaction identification known by the participant

clearingMemberIdentificationId.description: Clearing member identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

clearingMemberIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

participantIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

accountIdentificationId.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

collateralWithdrawalIdentification.description: Unique collateral withdrawal identification assigned by the A5X

securitiesCollateralIdentification.description: Securities collateral identification as known by party

securitiesQuantity.description: Quantity requested to securities distribution with command

securitiesCollateralValueAmount.description: Securities collateral value amount in active currency

securitiesCollateralValueCurrency.description: Currency code for securities collateral value
securitiesCollateralValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

securitiesStatusCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralStatusCode

securitiesRejectionInformation.description: Additional information regarding why the securities collateral proposal has a rejected status

cashCollateralIdentification.description: Cash collateral identification as known by party

cashOperationValueAmount.description: Amount requested to cash distribution with command

cashOperationValueCurrency.description: Currency code for cash operation value
cashOperationValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

cashCollateralValueAmount.description: Cash collateral value amount in active currency

cashCollateralValueCurrency.description: Currency code for cash collateral value
cashCollateralValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

cashStatusCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralStatusCode

cashRejectionInformation.description: Additional information regarding why the cash collateral proposal has a rejected status

federalBondsCollateralIdentification.description: Federal bonds collateral identification as known by party

federalBondsQuantity.description: Quantity requested to federal bonds collateral transfer

federalBondsCollateralValueAmount.description: Federal bonds collateral value amount in active currency

federalBondsCollateralValueCurrency.description: Currency code for federal bonds collateral value
federalBondsCollateralValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

federalBondsSelicOperationCode.description: SELIC operation code for federal bond transactions

federalBondsAssignerAccount.description: Provides federal bonds assigner account identification

federalBondsAssigneeAccount.description: Provides identification about federal bonds assignee account

federalBondsStatusCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralStatusCode

federalBondsRejectionInformation.description: Additional information regarding why the federal bonds collateral proposal has a rejected status

federalBondsSubstitutionStatusCode.description: Federal bonds collateral substitution status code
federalBondsSubstitutionStatusCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralStatusCode

federalBondsSubstitutionErrorCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalErrorCollateralCode, ExternalErrorRegistrationCode, ExternalAllocationErrorCode

federalBondsSubstitutionErrorRefId.description: Federal bonds substitution error reference ID
